reviewText: That wife had my mouth on the floor the whole movie!!! I wanted to jump through the screen. That's how you know you did a good job when you can draw your audience into the plot LOL! Good job..PS her husband was an amazing man..
The movie was good but hard to watch the abuse of A child.
This movie had a good message.  God is good.

Great DVD quality! The movie was clear and the message is heartfelt!
I will definitely purchase movies again from Media Megalodon... they've gone above and beyond for customer satisfaction.  I've learned that they can't control manufacturers defect... but will do what it takes to ensure customer satisfaction!! Something other companies should emulate - customer satisfaction!

Thank you all and continue great service!
So in 11 years they didn't redecorate that house? Lol
very good movie with a good story line
